entities.name: Systran SAS
entities.description: A pioneer and global leader in on-premise and cloud-based translation software, continuously evolving with breakthrough innovations and secured solutions. Successfully built a wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer base across highly sensitive sectors. A pioneer and trusted global leader in neural machine translation software.
keyStrengths: evolved continuously with breakthrough innovations and secured solutions
successfully built a wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer across highly sensitive sectors
solid track record of sustainable growth
Unique customer portfolio across highly sensitive sectors
Unmatched offering of verified machine translation software
global footprint allows the Group to maintain proximity and responsiveness with its customers
Management recently reinforced to fuel further growth
Complementary management team steering an efficient organization positioned for continued growth
unique expert positioning on the MT market
unique combination of expert translation solutions
well positioned to address any type of customer need with top-notch solutions
Best-in-class product portfolio leveraging strong technological assets
High brand recognition fostered by unparalleled innovations and quality of service
Both On-premise and SaaS deployment coverage
Outstanding client support with customer-centric organization and highly available support teams
Strong integration capabilities with end-users' work environments
Robust data security ensuring client data privacy
Large base of captive blue-chip clients with established historic relationships and strong retention
Strong international brand name and employer brand
Long successful track-record with blue-chip accounts
processes multi-lingual and multi-source data at large scale to provide actionable intelligence
Advanced professional cloud-based translation services for highly sensitive individuals & SMEs
owns unique rights to web data
State-of-the-art tools constituting a solid technical platform
Efficient tech stack with no legacy or technical debt
tools enable it to stand out from competitors, offering a complete range of services for the client
Strong value proposition for each plan
entities.growthStrategySummary: An ambitious growth strategy based on accelerated deployment of cloud solutions and diversification into new segment (e.g., media), new geographies and new customers (SMEs, B2C). A clear strategic roadmap with 5 main growth pillars: New technological innovations (foster R&D of transcript and context awareness translation), Core business growth (increasing MT solutions demands from emerging industries), External growth (attractive targets identified and on-going discussions), Cloud solution development (Marketplace and quality-control solutions), and International expansion (several key regions identified).

entities.segmentName: Worldwide language services and technologies market
entities.characteristics: Historically market growth was mainly driven by expansion of global trade, increasing international content demand and internationalization of supply chains. The pandemic market experienced a 2% contraction in 2020 due to sectors heavily afflicted by the pandemic but was offset by diversity of sectors served & structural shift to remote workplace.
entities.growthInfo: Future market growth driven by recovery from the pandemic, and accelerated market penetration in Asia
keyDrivers: rising workflow integration with human translation
Increased sale of MT solutions by LSP and large tech companies
extensive public and private investment in MT

entities.name: Data Security
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, ensuring data protection and compliance. This complies with demanding client requirements.

entities.description: On-premise offering designed for government environments with sensitive data; Scalable products to meet required throughput levels and connect with other government platforms tool
entities.pricingModelInfo: Sold under on-premise licenses per user, renewed annually or sold perpetually (incl. maintenance).

entities.name: Systran Translate Pro & Enterprise
entities.description: Targets SME’s that require translation engines for specific domain/sector with a budget between Translate Pro and Systran Pure Neural Server(SPNS). Offers SSO/SAML and other key features required by SME’s.
entities.pricingModelInfo: Multiple plans based on usage; Upfront fee charged upon purchase and monthly hosting fee (for Translate Pro clients)

entities.name: Systran Model Studio
entities.category: Cloud-based translation model creation tool and marketplace
entities.description: The one and only solution in the world allowing data owners to train its translation engines using its own data resulting in a customized translation model; offered via cloud or on premise; Usually sold with SPNS
entities.pricingModelInfo: Sold under 2 systems: share of SPNS license price for Systran Pure Neural Server users, fixed fee of €200 to train a specific model for Systran Translate Pro users.

entities.description: The new frontier and next milestone in translation technology, expected to gain market share within the fast-growing simultaneous interpretation segment. entities.name: Performance
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, related to translation quality and breadth. Supports over 140 language pairs (including rare ones like Takij and Tagalok) and numerous file formats (MS Office, PDF, Open office, Web, Localization, Audio, Images (OCR), Archives). It aims to answer multiple client needs and use-cases with great translation quality.

entities.name: User experience

entities.name: Customization
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, allowing adaptation to client-specific needs. Clients can use their own translation data (translation memory) to improve Systran’s engine performance. Modelled increase due to energy costs fluctuations, increase in private cloud customers, higher IT costs for R&D (language pairs trainings, large models creation, better IT cost tracking), and increase in software expenses (reselling partner ASR solutions to public sector customers).
Mainly relying on tools required for developers, infrastructure to produce Language Models, and non-strategic developments outsourcing to reduce costs.
Modelled taking into account strong market competition leading to salary increases to attract and retain talents, and FY22B inflation leading to salary raise expectations.

Mainly focusing on redesigning the corporate website to increase traffic and attract new customers, generating content to position the Group as a leader on the MT market, and media to ensure company visibility and drive traffic.
